data.text: “Aleke du si yɔ fũu
“Ele avi fam hehehe le zã me
“Le teteɖeanyi kple dzizizidɔ sesẽwo megbe la,
“Zion mɔwo le konyi fam
“Eƒe futɔwo zu edziɖulawo
“Zion vinyɔnu ƒe atsyɔ̃wo katã dzo le eŋu.
“Yerusalem ɖo ŋku eƒe kesinɔnu siwo nɔ
“Yerusalem ƒe nu vɔ̃wo lolo eya ta wòzu ame makɔmakɔ.
“Eƒe ɖiƒoƒo lé ɖe eƒe avɔto,
Futɔ la do asi ɖe eƒe kesinɔnuwo katã gbɔ;
Eƒe amewo katã le tsatsam le abolo dim kple ŋeŋe,
“Mi ame siwo katã to afi ma yi,
“Eɖo dzo ɖa tso dziƒo,
“Ebla nye nu vɔ̃wo abe kɔkuti ene,
“Aƒetɔ la gbe nu
“Esia ta mefa avi
Zion ke eƒe abɔwo me gake
“Yehowa le dzɔdzɔe,
“Meyɔ xɔ̃nyewo
“O Yehowa, kpɔ ale si metsi dzodzodzoe ɖa!
“Amewo se nye ŋeŋe
“Na be woƒe nu vɔ̃ɖi wɔwɔwo katã nava ŋkuwò me;
